Subject: CryptoParty: Penguicon Edition
Description: Everyday encryption for the general public. Learn to protect your hard drive's data, browse the web anonymously, encrypt your email, and more in this hands-on workshop. Absolute beginners are welcome; we will have volunteers on hand to provide you with software and help you learn to use it. Bring your laptop along to get the most from hands-on activities in this session.  Speakers include:Susan Sons, Chris Nehren, Jeremy Banks, Eric S. Raymond, Paul Berens, Adam Nuwer, Andrew Kelley, John D. Bell - Track: Tech  - Duration: 2 hours and 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector
